parameters.jsCode:
const lead = $input.first().json;
return [{
  json: {
    originalAddress: lead.address,
    validatedAddress: lead.address?.validated,
    score: lead.qualification?.score,
    category: lead.qualification?.category,
    roofArea: lead.solar?.roofArea || 0,
    estimatedKwh: lead.solar?.estimatedKwhPerYear || 0,
    costEUR: lead.system?.estimatedCostEUR || 0,
    state: lead.regional?.state || '',
    priority: lead.qualification?.priority,
    kfwEligible: lead.subsidy?.kfw270?.eligible || false,
    kfwAmount: lead.subsidy?.kfw270?.maxLoan || 0,
    bafaEligible: lead.subsidy?.bafa?.eligible || false,
    bafaAmount: lead.subsidy?.bafa?.subsidy || 0,
    subsidyNotes: lead.subsidyNotes || '',
    whatsappMessage: lead.whatsappMessage || '',
    enrichedAt: lead.enrichedAt
  }
}];
